# DAAO Analysis

```{python echo=FALSE}
df <- data.frame(sex=factor(rep(c("F", "M"), each=200)),weight=round(c(rnorm(200, mean=55, sd=5), rnorm(200, mean=65, sd=5))))
head(df)
``` 


```{python echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

p<-ggplot(df, aes(x=weight)) + 
  geom_histogram(color="black", fill="white")
p
```
